item.title: Bidirectional Encoder Representation with Matching Task for Sequential Recommendation
Face adversarial sample
item.description: The demo of the face attack system based on the adversarial sample (black box attack) is completed, which makes the AWS Face Rekognition system incorrectly classify.

item.title: ZiYue
item.description: ZiYue is the name of a gold jewelry series that means appaintment between parents and children.

item.title: Cloud Space
item.description: This project is a social innovation project that belongs to the intersection of urban science. We are committed to providing the community with public space (e.g., roof space) renewal design and follow-up urban community smart management system integration solution. This project has obtained the first prizes in several entrepreneurial competitions.

item.title: Remembrance
item.description:
At present, AI technology is developing at a high speed and has achieved remarkable results in the fields of voice, image, and natural language processing. Based on image and video fingerprint technology, we have built a smart cloud photo album platform, which aims to be a good helper for users to quickly and accurately find photoes.

Given main features of the album, we name the platform Remembrance that is intended to find memories. And the brand slogan is “no hard to find memories.”

We design the platform logo as a leaf. from the morphological point of view, it can also be understood as a pen made of feathers, which contains the meaning of “recording”. On the other hand, it is a bookmark made of leaves that helps the owner find the desired photoes in the album.

item.title: Title Trigger: All titles you want
item.description: This is a project from Google AI ML Winter Camp (2019). In the camp, we developed a NLP Project called Title Trigger, including extraction & abstraction, generation, text style transferring, etc. in different dimensions, using a bunch of latest technology to achieve the best performance. The training speed was dramatically improved. Finally, our project obtained Most Technical Award.

item.title: WeCup
item.description: We developed a smart water cup WeCup, integrating an alarm clock and serverl medicine boxes, to provide a more convenient medication experience for the elderly and young people with medication habits, and change the status quo of ‚Äúforgetting to take medicine, not wanting to take medicine‚Äù.

item.title: Stock Prediction
item.description:
This is Kaggle data mining competition. By analyzing news data to predict stock prices, Kagglers have a unique opportunity to advance the state of research in understanding the predictive power of the news. This power, if harnessed, could help predict financial outcomes and generate significant economic impact all over the world.

During that, we developed the stock forecasting system based financial data and news data, using XGboost, Estimation Distribution Algorithm(EDA) and we got top 2% final result around the world.

item.title: Glaze Spraying
item.description:
Glaze spraying is a key process in ceramic production, yet how to make the glaze coating uniform in various situations is a rather confusing issue. We have to set up different models at different times. If we can find a relatively universal strategy, much time can be saved.

In this paper, we adopt elliptic double Œ≤ distribution model to obtain the thickness cumulative model on planes and solve Issue 1. Then we modify the basic model to make it applicable when dealing with curved surfaces and spheres. In this way, we deal with Issue 2 and 3 successfully.

As any free-form curved surface can be regarded as a superposition of several basic ruled curved surfaces, combinatorial use of piece-wise approximation and superstition can perfectly generalize our solution above, as shown in Issue 4.

We use MATLAB simulation to find the optimal solution. Sensitivity analysis of spray thickness and spray gun height is also made.
